name: Mission Zircon
overview: Mission Zircon is a side scrolling shoot 'em up game. Princess Cirzona is due to be married but the grand ceremonial zircon crown has been stolen by the evil Zaals. As the special assistant of the king it is up to you to gain the crown back within 30 days. Dressed in a jetsuit player has to finish 8 levels, killing encountered enemies and avoiding the walls and other moving objects.
